entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
